oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 100 ginānjī ćopaḍī ćogaḍīevārī
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn , active 14th century

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ends with prayer seeking for forgiveness for mistakes.
Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn, Pīr ʻAbd al-Nabī, ... [et al.].
Published for the Imāmī Ismāīlī School.
Binding in fair condition, cloth-covered paper covers.
Frontispiece: portrait of Aga Khan III in official regalia.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.

With: Ārtī / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; [Ćoga]ḍīā:sāñjījā:pañj / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Shams ; [Veñtī] / Pīr Ḥasan Shāh Sawāī, Pīr Ḥasan Shāh, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, ... [et al.] ; [Yā Khûdāvañdh] / Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn, Pīr Imām Shāh, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, ... [et al.] ; Sûbhûajā ćogaḍīā [24 gināns for recitation in the morning] / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; Gaṭpāṭjā:veṭhā:ginān 5/ Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn, Shamsī, ... [et al.] ; Venatījā:ginān:5 / Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn, Pīr ʻAbd al-Nabī, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; Ginān:bhībhī:emām:bhegamjā:8 / Pīr Imām Begum, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn ; [Hakman] / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn.
